data.name: PollyDestroyer 3D
data.detailed_description:
The all-new sequel to the much-loved PollyDestroyer. This game is much improved with new mechanics and enemies to fight.

The Story

You're a space ranger who needs to return home from an alien planet, you have a long way to go ranger and it won't be easy! You'll need to fight your way home while collecting the samples that the home base needs you to bring home, collecting coins for ship upgrades and saving creatures that have escaped from your fellow space rangers' ships.

Implemented Features

  • Fighting
  • Flying
  • Health & Regeneration System
  • Multiple Levels

To be Implemented Features

  • Ship Customisation options
  • Ship Cosmetics Store
  • Weapons Store
  • Even More Levels
  • Story
  • Multiplayer

data.short_description: The sequel to PollyDestroyer, PollyDestroyer 3D! A 3D Shoot Em Up Space themed game! Fight enemies and level up to survive and progress the levels!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD FX 8000 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750Ti OR AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These minimum specifications have been tested to work well on Medium settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: AMD FX 8000 or Intel Equivulent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750Ti OR AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These recommended specifications have been tested to be the max needed to play this game.
